results.title: STA-9090 in combination with a statin exerts enhanced protective effects in rats fed a high-fat diet and exposed to diethylnitrosamine and thioacetamide.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ inhibits @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@HMG-CoA reductase@@@, depleting cellular @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ required for @GENE_SHH @GENE_6469 @@@Sonic hedgehog@@@ (@GENE_SHH @GENE_6469 @@@Shh@@@) modification and signaling.

STA-9090 in combination with a statin exerts enhanced protective effects in rats fed a high-fat diet and exposed to diethylnitrosamine and thioacetamide. Front Pharmacol. 2024;15():1454829. PMID: 39309001
